short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: All-in-one tool for organizing, managing, and structuring your information into a comprehensive knowledge base.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
moyoNote is a browser extension based on further training of the GPT large model. You can select complex content on a web page, click the Moyu icon, and generate an outline note with one click. The generated outline notes can be reviewed and viewed on the moyoNote official website at any time. Moreover, you can ask moyoNote any questions or assign tasks, and it can answer any complex questions, help you write copy, raise questions, and even write code, becoming a powerful assistant for your work and improving your work efficiency!
Typical usage scenarios:
1️⃣ Meeting minutes organization
Perfectly compatible with mainstream online meeting products such as Tencent Meeting and Feishu Meeting, quickly organizing complex meeting minutes into mind maps.
2️⃣ Summarizing exam key points
Complex course materials can also be organized into review mind maps with one click using moyoNote, providing a clear understanding of the knowledge structure.
3️⃣ Interpretation of laws and policies
Financial and real estate policies can also be interpreted with one click, with the content categorized and presented.
4️⃣ Understanding industry jargon
When surfing the internet and encountering unfamiliar jargon, click moyoNote to instantly turn jargon into plain language, quickly clarifying the relevant knowledge structure.
How to use moyoNote:
1. In the browser app store, select and install the browser extension.
2. Select any text on the web page, and let moyoNote quickly draw a mind map for you.
3. View the organized mind map on the moyoNote official website.
4. For content you don't understand, you can further explore by generating a mind map or get answers through the conversation.
Let moyoNote become your powerful assistant at school and work, easily handling various tasks and improving your work efficiency!
